variable.name: chip
variable.description: The Illumina chip used to genotype the sample.

variable.name: newlygenotyped
variable.description: Some samples were pulled from previously genotyped studies and other samples were genotyped as part of a focused resistant hypertension study.
variable.value: Previously genotyped as part of another study

variable.name: SAMPLE_USE
variable.value: SNP genotypes obtained using standard or custom microarrays
